metadata.description:
An astronaut traveling alone to the Red Planet was plunged into an unknown adventure. His mission was to complete the exploration of Mars and unravel the planet's secrets.

When the spaceship landed on the surface of Mars, the astronaut found himself in the midst of an immense landscape. Red earth, rocky cliffs and huge mountains rising in the distance. With excitement and curiosity, the astronaut began to explore Mars.

The silence and mysteries of Mars aroused in the astronaut an endless fascination and desire to explore. Although he was alone, his experiences on Mars shed light on the future steps of humanity.
metadata.name: Alone on Mars #1/5
